title: (x) Looking for a modern Eurostile-type font - Mdd {Yves}
content:
good morning -   
   
i am searching for a modern font similar to the eurostyle typeface.   
i got inspiration from the following site (the header font):   
   
 [http://www.danishdesigners.dk/dd\_default.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184014/http:/www.danishdesigners.dk/dd_default.asp)   
   
i think its looks nearly like an Eurostyle but a little more modern... any ideas?   
   
thanks for answers   
jenz
author: yenzen

comments.content: The logotype used for "Danish Designers" is designed by Jonas Hecksher from danish e-types

thanks al lot.   
   
any ideas where i can purchase this font?   
   
jenz

This is so weird - it looks like [FTF Morgan Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184014/http:/www.secretonix.pt/ftf/catalogue/FTFmorganSans.htm), but that's   
a Portuguese design, while they have plenty of nice Danish   
faces in that particular style.

It's called MDD and can be viewed - sort of - on [Playtype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184014/http:/www.playtype.com/),   
the website with the most confusing interface _ever._
